description: Introduce the topic of building effective agents and set the stage for the presentation using the 'opening:text' layout.

Provide a high-level overview of what agents are and the key workflows involved in building them. Use the flowchart illustrating the LLM process from input to output to explain the interactions between components.
Highlight specific examples where agents are useful and summarize the key takeaways from the presentation. Use the 'ending:text' layout to conclude the presentation.
